response.original_title: Blue's Clues & You!: Blue's Sing-Along Spectacular
response.overview: Get ready to sing along with Josh, Magenta, The Mailtime Quartet, Slippery Soap and of course Blue! Help Blue identify the sounds of musical instruments and form her own band. After the tune-tastic concert, join Josh and Blue's dance party and help figure out Blue's favorite dance! Put your paws together for Blue's Sing-Along Spectacular!
response.title: Blue's Clues & You!: Blue's Sing-Along Spectacular
